title: Śrīla Gaura Kiśora Dās Bābājī Mahārāj
author: by Śrīla Bhakti Rakṣak Śrīdhar Dev-Goswāmī Mahārāj

translation: “I bow to our Guru, Śrīla Gaura Kiśora Dās,<br class="SongVerse__break" />the pure devotee beyond social class;<br class="SongVerse__break" />the bee in the lotus of the feet of Śrī Gaurāṅga,<br class="SongVerse__break" />who deep in his heart serves Śrī Rādhā forever.”
